query:
UPDATE aggregator.user_history
        SET
            remaining_size = remaining_size - $1,
            total_filled = total_filled + $1,
            order_status = CASE remaining_size - $1
                WHEN 0 THEN 'closed'
                ELSE order_status
            END,
            last_updated_at = $4
        WHERE order_id = $2 AND market_id = $3
